translation: It is found in Hamburg, Germany and is one of the most popular and most visited landmarks in the country. The Stinky Louvre: The first cheese museum opened its doors in Paris Today I visited The Miniatur Wunderland, which, according to Guinness World Records, the largest model railway system in the world. It is located at the historical Speicherstadt in Hamburg, Germany. These are my best pictures I took today pic.twitter.com/SihwPmusYF ."We had a vision to recreate the Grand Prix with really small cars from Formula 1, said Gerrit Brown, founder of the attraction. In the new area the layout has a 16-kilometer track.  "In just 3 days, witness the grand unveiling of our latest masterpiece - the Monaco section including a full autonomaous Formula 1 race! "Miniatur Wunderland" has about 14 different worlds and thematic areas. One of the most popular is Knuffingen, the fictive city that sets the start. At the airport in the capital and takes off 45 different planes.The Principality of Monaco and the French Provence are also part of the Miniatur Wunderland scale 1:87. In the reconstruction of Switzerland, a miniature factory produces real chocolate with the pressing of a button. Worlds biggest model Airport! Miniatur Wunderland located in Hamburg, Germany.
